android.car.media

类 CarMediaManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.car.CarManagerBase
      • android.car.media.CarMediaManager

  • public final class CarMediaManager
extends CarManagerBase
    API for updating and receiving updates to the primary media source in the car.

    • 嵌套类概要

      限定符和类型 类和说明

      Listener for updates to the primary media source
      static interface  CarMediaManager.MediaSourceMode

    • 构造器详细资料

      • CarMediaManager

        public CarMediaManager(Car car,
                       IBinder service)
        Get an instance of the CarMediaManager. Should not be obtained directly by clients, use Car.getCarManager(String) instead.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getMediaSource

        public ComponentName getMediaSource(int mode)
        Gets the currently active media source for the provided mode
        参数:
        mode - the mode (playback or browse) for which the media source is active in.
        返回:
        the active media source in the provided mode, will be non-null.

      • setMediaSource

        public void setMediaSource(ComponentName componentName,
                           int mode)
        Sets the currently active media source for the provided mode
        参数:
        mode - the mode (playback or browse) for which the media source is active in.

      • addMediaSourceListener

        public void addMediaSourceListener(CarMediaManager.MediaSourceChangedListener callback,
                                   int mode)
        Register a callback that receives updates to the active media source.
        参数:
        callback - the callback to receive active media source updates.
        mode - the mode to receive updates for.

      • removeMediaSourceListener

        public void removeMediaSourceListener(CarMediaManager.MediaSourceChangedListener callback,
                                      int mode)
        Unregister a callback that receives updates to the active media source.
        参数:
        callback - the callback to be unregistered.
        mode - the mode that the callback was registered to receive updates for.

      • getLastMediaSources

        public java.util.List<ComponentName> getLastMediaSources(int mode)
        Retrieve a list of media sources, ordered by most recently used.
        参数:
        mode - the mode (playback or browse) for which to retrieve media sources from.
        返回:
        non-null list of media sources, ordered by most recently used

      • onCarDisconnected

        public void onCarDisconnected()
        从类复制的说明: CarManagerBase
        Handle disconnection of car service (=crash). As car service has crashed already, this call should only clean up any listeners / callbacks passed from client. Clearing object passed to car service is not necessary as car service has crashed. Note that Car*Manager will not work any more as all binders are invalid. Client should re-create all Car*Managers when car service is restarted.
        指定者:
        onCarDisconnected 在类中 CarManagerBase

      • isIndependentPlaybackConfig

        public boolean isIndependentPlaybackConfig()
        Returns whether the browse and playback sources can be changed independently.
        返回:
        true if the browse and playback sources can be changed independently, false if it isn't or if the value could not be determined.

      • setIndependentPlaybackConfig

        public void setIndependentPlaybackConfig(boolean independent)
        Sets whether the browse and playback sources can be changed independently.
        参数:
        independent - whether the browse and playback sources can be changed independently.

      • requestCarSource

        public void requestCarSource(int sourceType,
                             int mode)
        request the source for the provided mode
        参数:
        sourceType - the sourceType for music source
        mode - the mode for the audio zone.

      • getCurrentCarSource

        public int getCurrentCarSource(int mode)
        obtain the current play music source
        参数:
        mode - the mode for the audio zone.

      • setCarSourceState

        public void setCarSourceState(int sourceType,
                              boolean active)
        set the source active or not active
        参数:
        mode - the mode for the audio zone.

      • setCarSourceZone

        public void setCarSourceZone(int sourceType,
                             int zoneId)
        set the source to the design zone
        参数:
        mode - the mode for the audio zone.
